io.atomix.cluster.discovery.NodeDiscoveryService

  • Packages that use NodeDiscoveryService 
    Package Description
    io.atomix.cluster.discovery
    Provides classes and interfaces for extensible cluster membership discovery.
    io.atomix.cluster.protocol
    Provides interfaces and implementations for group membership protocols.
